args.natural_language_statement: Let z : Complex. Show that Arg (exp z) = Im z and |exp z| = exp (Re z). Translate to Lean4 (import Mathlib at top), end theorem with := by sorry. Provide a Lean4 theorem statement (no proof) consolidating both equalities.

result:
{"ok": true, "lean_translation": "import Mathlib
open Complex Function Set
open Real

/-- Let z : Complex. Show that Arg (exp z) = Im z and |exp z| = exp (Re z). Translate to Lean4 (import Mathlib at top), end theorem with := by sorry. Provide a Lean4 theorem statement (no proof) consolidating both equalities. -/
theorem arg_exp_extracted (z : ℂ) : (Complex.exp z).arg = z.im ∧ Complex.abs (Complex.exp z) = Complex.exp z.re := sorry"}

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- Let z : Complex. Show that Arg (exp z) = Im z and |exp z| = exp (Re z). -/
theorem arg_exp_extracted (z : ℂ) : (Complex.exp z).arg = z.im ∧ Complex.abs (Complex.exp z) = Complex.exp z.re := by sorry
